identity.name: CryptoVault Design System
identity.vibe: Professional, High-Frequency, Institutional Grade, yet Web3 Native
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss Precision with Cyberpunk Aesthetics
Data is Art: Charts and numbers are the heroes, not just content
Dark Mode Only: The market never sleeps, neither does the UI
Speed: Visuals must feel fast (italics, motion, sharp angles)

headings.usage: Hero titles, Section headers, Big stats

mono.usage: Prices, Tickers, Wallet Addresses, Code snippets

rules: Use 'Unbounded' for all text larger than 24px.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL financial data (prices, % change, balances).
Overlines/Labels should be uppercase and wide (tracking-widest).

spacing.rule: Use 2x more spacing than standard. Dashboards can be dense (p-4), Marketing must be airy (p-24).

marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Use col-span-7 vs col-span-5.

dashboard.rules: Dense. Every pixel used. No jagged bottoms.

primary.classes: bg-primary text-black font-bold px-8 py-3 rounded-none hover:bg-primary/90 hover:shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(0,240,255,0.4)] transition-all uppercase tracking-wider font-mono

secondary.classes: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white px-8 py-3 rounded-none hover:bg-white/5 transition-all uppercase tracking-wider font-mono

inputs.classes: bg-black/50 border border-white/10 rounded-lg focus:border-primary focus:ring-1 focus:ring-primary/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 font-mono

charts.style: Area charts with gradients. No grid lines (or very subtle). Tooltips must be dark glass.

visual_enhancers.textures: Add a subtle noise texture overlay to the background (opacity 0.03).
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effect for active cards.
visual_enhancers.glows: Use colored shadows (shadow-cyan-500/20) instead of black shadows.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Duotone) or Lucide React (Thin stroke).

hero_background.desc: Abstract blue squares on black - Use for Hero Section Background with overlay

section_background.desc: Purple/Blue abstract - Use for Features or CTA section background

floating_coins.desc: 3D Floating Coins - Use for 'Supported Assets' or Hero Image

trader_pro.desc: Trader with multiple monitors - Use for 'Pro Trading' feature section

bitcoin_3d.desc: Abstract dark 3D texture - Use for card backgrounds or subtle texture

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS FIRST: Add Unbounded, Manrope, and JetBrains Mono to index.css via Google Fonts import.
2. SETUP TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the new colors (primary: #00F0FF) and fonts.
3. OVERRIDE SHADCN: Do not use default Shadcn styles. Force the 'Glassmorphism' style on all Cards and Dialogs.
4. MOCK DATA: Since backend might not be ready, create a 'mockData.js' file for crypto prices and portfolio history.
5. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Make them look like 'TradingView' (dark bg, green/red candles or area charts).
6. AUTH PAGES: Make them immersive. Split screen: Left side form, Right side 3D abstract image.
7. DASHBOARD: Needs a Sidebar (collapsible) and a Topbar (ticker).
8. TRADING VIEW: 3-column layout. Left: Order Form. Middle: Chart. Right: Order Book/History.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER: use AI assistant Emoji characters like ðŸ¤–ðŸ§  etc for icons.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
